Articles.Content:
This is a bomber i make that is meant to resemble a ww2 bomber

it was 4 main engines

but had 2 jet engines for a vertical take off (you don\'t need to turn them on)

It had VTOL capabilities

It uses the damned robotics and damned aerospace mods and struts from the KW challenger pack

btw it had no bombs attached

you need to make them yourself

you could add a drone

Most of the mods can be found here:

http://www.playeti.com/

I have made a new version of it

its the same but with guns and missiles

it uses the rail gun and missiles mod
